task.title: User Sync
task.shortdesc: User Sync allows you to enter the endpoint used to fetch user profile data from your user management system.

context.p: See Identity Integration > Your Identity Service for more information on how Livefyre uses this URL to sync your user data with Livefyre through Ping for Pull.

li.p: Profile Sync URL: enter the URL from which Livefyre will fetch your updated user profile information.
